title: new york for graphic designers
content:
Hi to everybody,  
next week i will be in New York.  
Does someone know events, exhibitions, museums or similar about graphic design or typography that i can visit?

thank you,  
tommi
author: tommi

comments.content: I recommend just wandering around the city and checking out the signage. Aside from certain pockets of Manhattan that are overrun with chain stores, youâ€™ll find all sorts of inventive type.

Inger-Lise and James,  
really thanks for your answers.

tommi
